Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians face the Detroit Tigers in ALDS Game 1, with Josh Naylor returning to action after going 2-for-4 in his last game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played on Saturday at 1:08 PM ET on TBS.
Josh Naylor is 1-for-7 in his career against Tyler Holton.
Naylor is 0-for-5 when facing off against Tyler Holton this season.
Others: Josh Naylor is hitting.243 with 27 doubles, 31 home runs, and 58 walks this season.
Among hitters in MLB play, Naylor ranks 18th in homers and eighth in RBI.
